title: Derwin James Makes History
description:
Field Yates and the NFL Live crew discuss Deshaun Watson’s possible suspension settlement, Derwin James’ becoming the highest paid safety in NFL history, Mac Jones’ comments on the Patriots not naming an OC for the 2022 season, Joe Burrow having surgery to remove his appendix and Baker Mayfield and Sam Darnold’s competition to be the Panthers’ starting QB. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Mac Jones comments on his team's lack of an OC and Derwin James becomes the highest paid safety in NFL history.
